concept.title: Method of paranormal investigation
concept.shortdesc: Paranormal investigation can follow many different methods though they typically share similar features. Methods may include the use of people and technology to collect data.

conbody.p: Many paranormal investigators use a scientific or pseudo-scientific methods in their investigation. Investigators each have their own methods which rely on technologies and human experiences. One common feature is carefully documenting experiences and movements to help in later debunking.
